docs.title: Home
docs.text:
# Welcome to Illegitimate Humans

Welcome to **Illegitimate Humans**, a hub for experiments, projects, and creative tech explorations.  

Here you will find a collection of projects, resources, and links that explore the intersection of technology, AI, and human creativity.

- Browse our projects
- Learn more about our team
- Discover useful resources

docs.title: About
docs.text:
# About Illegitimate Humans

**Illegitimate Humans** is a digital collective dedicated to exploring innovative technology, generative art, AI experiments, and ethical implications in creative projects.  

We focus on:
- Experimenting with AI and human collaboration  
- Documenting projects for educational purposes  
- Sharing tools, resources, and knowledge with the community

docs.title: Links
docs.text:
# Useful Links

- [MediaClients Wiki](https://mediaclients.wiki/) – Inspiration for our wiki layout  
- [GitHub](https://github.com/) – Our code repositories  
- [Plex](https://plex.tv/) – Media server resources  
- [Python](https://www.python.org/) – Programming tools  
- [MkDocs](https://www.mkdocs.org/) – Documentation generator

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
# Projects

Here are some of our ongoing and past projects:

- **Synthetic Voices** – AI-generated audio experiments  
- **Vision Rewrites** – Generative visual art projects  
- **Code Consciousness** – Exploring creative programming and AI code interactions  
- **Retro Tech Remix** – Combining retro tech aesthetics with modern digital art
